Allspice.name: Allspice
Allspice.description: Some basic spice, freshly harvested from a Spice Plant.

Bean.name: Bean
Bean.description: A bean. It can be used for cooking, or it can be seasoned to turn it into seeds for different trees and plants.

Cherry.name: Cherry
Cherry.description: A basic cherry, freshly picked from a Fruit Tree.

Chunk of Beryl.name: Chunk of Beryl
Chunk of Beryl.description: Halfway between sparkly and dull, it's an innocuous chunk of beryl.

Chunk of Dullite.name: Chunk of Dullite
Chunk of Dullite.description: A hefty chunk of dullite. What it lacks in sparkliness it makes up for in, um, dullness.

Chunk of Metal Rock.name: Chunk of Metal Rock
Chunk of Metal Rock.description: Chunky and metally, this rock, when smelted, makes Plain Metal. Boring maybe, but it's an excellent base for more ambitious alchemical experimentation.

Chunk of Sparkly.name: Chunk of Sparkly
Chunk of Sparkly.description: It's a pleasantly twinkly chunk of sparkly!

Egg.name: Egg
Egg.description: A plain, unseasoned egg, newly harvested from an Egg Plant. It can be used for all kinds of cooking, or it can be hatched into different animals.

Fancy Pick.name: Fancy Pick
Fancy Pick.description: A super-deluxe fancy pick for fancy miners. Okay, maybe it doesn't look that fancy on the outside. It's the inside that counts.

General Vapour.name: General Vapour
General Vapour.description: A flask of all-purpose general vapour, harvested from a Gas Plant.

High Class Hoe.name: High Class Hoe
High Class Hoe.description: More refined than your average hoe, the High-Class Hoe is a hoe you'll be proud to be seen with. Extra investment brings a five-times longer lifespan: With this glamorous new companion you'll be hoeing the whole night through.

Lump of Earth.name: Lump of Earth
Lump of Earth.description: Many have tried to sum up the wonder of Earth, with superlatives like "Earthy", "Lumpy" and "Eart... oh, that's been said? Brown, then." But it's just a lump of earth. For building with.

Lump of Loam.name: Lump of Loam
Lump of Loam.description: Ah, loam sweet loam. Moist and fertile, and leagues above plain old earth, this rich, meaty chunk of ground will do any building project proud.

Modestly Sized Ruby.name: Modestly Sized Ruby
Modestly Sized Ruby.description: A modestly sized ruby of nonetheless staggering beauty.

Pick.name: Pick
Pick.description: A relatively sturdy pick, without which mining cannot be done. A plain pick takes care of business, but it's not designed to last.

Plain Bubble.name: Plain Bubble
Plain Bubble.description: A common, ordinary, plain bubble harvested from Bubble Tree.

Plank.name: Plank
Plank.description: A plain wooden plank with many uses.

Shovel.name: Shovel
Shovel.description: An essential for anyone that calls a spade a shovel, this simple tool masterpiece can be used to harvest Peat, dig for dirt (well, Earth), and occasionally land a juicy piece of Loam.
